coffee_machine_on.23139: Turn on the switch on the coffee maker

toaster_left_lever_down.94360: Push down the left lever of the toaster

toaster_right_lever_down.13186: Push down the right toaster switch
toaster_right_lever_down.51325: Push down the right button of the toaster.

toaster_right_lever_up.10933: Move the right lever to the top
toaster_right_lever_up.13254: Push the press handle on the toaster up
toaster_right_lever_up.2890: Lift up the right button of the toaster.

toaster_on.70018: Turn on the right side of the toaster

toaster_off.3680: Turn off the left side of the toaster

toaster_bottom_left_button.927: Press the button on the bottom left corner of the toaster

toaster_bottom_right_button.83775: Press the button on the bottom right corner of the toaster

cup_to_bowl.29613: Pour the things in the cup into the bowl
cup_to_bowl.56878: Pour the things in the cup into the glass bowl

close_right_cabinet_door.45008: Close the right door of the top cabinet to the right

close_bottom_left_cabinet_door.56903: Close the bottom cabinet door on the left

close_white_cabinet_door.1477: Close the bottom door of the white cabinet.

open_right_cabinet_door.8863: Open the right door of the cabinet above the coffeemaker
open_right_cabinet_door.51105: Open the first top kitchen cabinet on the right
open_right_cabinet_door.48713: Open the door on the right side of the cupboard
open_right_cabinet_door.32481: Open the top right cabinet door

open_left_cabinet_door.22326: Open the bottom left cabinet door
open_left_cabinet_door.42309: Open the left bottom cabinet door
open_left_cabinet_door.58859: Open the top left cupboard door

open_third_cabinet_from_left.25411: Open the left door of the third upper cabinet from the left
open_third_cabinet_from_left.20858: Open the third upper cabinet from the left

open_misc_cabinet.78648: Open the third cabinet door from the right

tap_open_close.25268: Open the right handle of the tap, then close it
tap_open_close.3274: Open and close the right tap

microwave_door_close.26175: Close the door of the microwave
